info.name: Firefox: Black or White Icons
info.description: Choose between all-black or all-white iconsets. Windows only. Compatible with Australis (Firefox 29).
info.additionalInfo: (27/01/2014) Added #email-link-button. (27/11/2013) Compatibility with Australis. (04/07/2012) Dropped support for Firefox 12 and older. (11/02/2012) Now works with dropmarkers (Firefox 13+)(see bug #609107). (10/11/2011) Added option to force black icons. (03/09/2011) Fixed a bug with Rainbow Color Tools color picker. (21/08/2011) Fixed a bug with new tab button; fixed tab scroll buttons. (20/08/2011) Fixes for bug #580194 and bug #673164 (thanks user 43231). (15/08/2011) Now works in every toolbar (not just Navigation Toolbar).
